mean_en: to put somebody/something into a liquid so that they or it are completely covered; to become or make somebody completely involved in something
sentence: She immersed herself in the book and didn't hear her mother calling.
sentence_trans: 她完全沉浸在那本书中，没有听见她妈妈的呼唤。
word_etyma: im进 + merse沉，没 → 沉进去 → immerse沉浸
